snippet: WAMSLER--Dr. Karl Maximilian Friedrich, beloved and revered father and father-in-law of Bettina Wamsler and Christian Bechtle, Susanne Wamsler and Paul Singer, Irene Banning and Jack Banning, Caroline A. Wamsler and DeWayne N. Phillips, and Pauline Wamsler and David J. Sales died peacefully surrounded by his family at his home in Pocking, Germany on Saturday, June 18, 2016. He is also survived by his twelve grandchildren: Clara, Luisa, Christopher, Johanna, Inga, Kaspar, Marie, George, Charlotte, Schuyler, Karl and Sophia. His commanding intellect, pervasive charm, love of family, and unfailing belief in a good world informed a life of integrity and extraordinary achievements. He was the rock of his family and an example for all who knew him. The burial and requiem will be held in Pocking, St. Pius on June 29, 2016. Services are being made by Zirngibl Funeral Home, Hanfelder Str., 53, Starnberg 82319. (+49.8151.36140). 1/3
